markdownRemark.html:
EUSO works towards concerts at the end of each semester. We play a wide variety of music from Handel to Shostakovich and Strauss to Britten and we work with a range of prestigious conductors who help us maintain a very high standard.

Next Concert

Most likely, the next concert is going to take place at 19th Nov 2022 at the Reid Hall. The time and place will be confirmed soon, but until then you can save the date in your calendar.

Past Concerts

You can have a listen to our repertoire playlist (Spotify).

Academic Year Repertoire
2021 - 2022 Britten: Simple Sympthony
Mozart: Eine kleine Nachtmusik
Janacek: Suite for Strings
Coleridge-Taylor: 4 Novelletten for String Orchestra, Op. 52
Sufjan Stevens: Suite from 'Run Rabbit Run'
Tchaikovsky: Serenade for String Orchestra, Op. 48
Sanders: Suite for String Orchestra
Dare: Three Highland Sketches
Holst: St. Paul's Suite

Bridge: Three Idylls
Britten: Variations on a Theme of Frank Bridge, Op. 10
2018 - 2019 Handel: Concerto Grosso, Op. 6 No. 7
Bevan-Baker: Rhapsody for Cello and String Orchestra
Tippett: Concerto for Double String Orchestra
2017 - 2018 Purcell: Chacony in G Minor

Mozart: Eine Kleine Nachtmusik

2014 - 2015 Mendelssohn: String Symphony No.12 in G minor
Pärt: Fratres
Britten: Variations on a Theme of Frank Bridge Op. 10

Vivaldi: Cello Concerto in G major, RV413

2013 - 2014 Bach: "Ich habe genug" for flute and soprano

Handel: Arias with mezzo-soprano Carole Clarke

Elgar: Serenade for Strings
Stuart Taylor: Against the Current (première)
Purcell: Four-Part Fantasias
